item.title: Smooth Sailing: Simplify AWS Environment Switching with AWS CLI
item.description: Problem As a developer or QA engineer using AWS CLI, switching between different AWS accounts or environments can be a complicated process. However, I recently discovered an open-source utility that can make this process much easier. With this tool, switching between accounts is as simple as typing a single word. I have found this utility to be a lifesaver, particularly when debugging EKS pods with Kubectl across DEV and QA environments.
